name: a visual novel that is not at all based on any experiences that i have had or am currently having
name_original: a visual novel that is not at all based on any experiences that i have had or am currently having
description:
a visual novel that is not at all based on any experiences that i have had or am currently having is exactly what it sounds like! ... mostly.

okay, i MAY have been lying when i said it's not at all based on any experiences that i have had or am currently having, but come on! it only MAY have been a horrible lie!

i made this for meatlyjam in march 2020, which is right now as i am writing this! yay!

if you liked this game, go ahead and check out my other game which is here:

https://educated-child-games.itch.io/normaldatingsim

p. s. you should download this
